songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah! Yeah Uh!

[Verse 1: Badshah]
I am feeling super
Dono Hath Upar
Nahi Fikar Kisi Ki
Jo Bhi Kehta, Kehta Munhh Par
Mere Sath Mera Gang, Boy
Hum Club Karein Bang, Boy
Seedhe Saadhe Hain Thode Se
Hum Kaafi Zyada Flameboyant
Yeah Boy!
Sab Yaar Hain Sath Mein
Aur Duniya Hai Rakhi Jaise Pocket Mein
Nahi Aane Wala Hath Main
Main Sabse Tezz
Jaise Betha Hoon Main Rocket Mein
Main Hoon Ek Artist
Aur Chill Karna Mera Art Hai
Abhi Toh Kaafi Kuch Hone Wala Hai
Abhi Toh Party Hui Just Start Hai

[Chorus: Major Lazer]
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free

[Verse 2: Badshah]
Mera Sar Gaya Khapp
Ab Daaleinge Khapp
Abhi Nahi Toh Kab?
Bethe Bethe Hogaye Bore
Ab Karna Hai Thoda Sa Shor
Na Koi Had
Na Koi Condition
Bus Celebration
Bina Matlab, Bina Ocassion
Every city, Every Nation
Say What?, Say What?
Say When?, Say Where?
Bolo Kya Hai Scene
Mere Sath Hai Mera Crew
They Don't Party Like We Do
Na We Don't Care
Na We Don't Care
Hum Bilkul Cray
Hum Se Panga Na Koi Le
Hath Utha Ke Everybody Say
C'mon!

[Chorus: Major Lazer]
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free

[Bridge: Badshah]
Yeah
Put Your Hands Up & Party
Iss Bajti Beat Pe
Put Your Hands Up & Party
Laga Ke Repeat Pe
Put Your Hands Up & Party
Iss Bhari Bharkam Beat Pe
Put Your Hands Up & Party
Laga Ke Repeat Pe
C'mon!

[Chorus: Major Lazer]
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free

[Outro: Major Lazer]
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free
Hey!
I wanna be free, I wanna be free
I wanna be free
I wanna be free
songs.title: I Wanna Be Free
